sep.gaia.resources

Class ResourceMaster

  • java.lang.Object
    • sep.gaia.resources.ResourceMaster

  • public class ResourceMaster
extends java.lang.Object
    This class holds all DataResourceManager implementations. The DataResourceManager objects can be identified by their labels. This is necessary for iterating
    Author:
    Johannes Bauer
